{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Dane-Elec |model=MJ-2n1W-C |upc=804272743425 |fcc_date=12/20/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gigastone |manuf_model=SmartBox A2 |availability=common |type=media streamer |fcc_id=PLE-WD2501 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Female Mini-B |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9331 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6406E |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T51163QJ-BCF7 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, micro SD, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9331 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |addl_chips=4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, Mixed-Signal Microcontroller;Texas Instruments;MSP430G2333;;1;,,, USB Charging Port Controller;Texas Instruments;TPS2546;;1;,,,, Dual Operational Amplifier;Texas Instruments;LM358;;1;,,,, |flags=battery powered |stock_os=Linux;2.6.31; |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Media Streamer |default_ip=192.168.1.2 |default_user=root |default_pass=root |oui=C0:34:B4 }} ''Dane-Elec Media Streamer''
[http://www.dane-memory.com/mediastreamer Product Page]
Powered by 2500mAh Li-ion battery
*Telnet is running and can be accessed afer connecting via :wireless using IP address and default user and password.
Hackaday Forums explored this device [http://forums.hackaday.com/viewtopic.php?f=8&t=4136 here]
